text:
Jaunt | https://jauntvr.com/ | San Mateo, CA, ONSITE | Full time | visa transfers/OPT OK

Jaunt is the global partner of choice for producing and distributing immersive content. We build platforms, SDKs and services for creating and distributing AR/VR experiences. We're exceptionally well funded and we work with many of the biggest media companies.

We're particularly looking for:

Machine Learning, Jaunt R&D; http://grnh.se/xrtgse1 (you'd be working directly with me on this)

Data/analytics infrastructure engineers; http://grnh.se/41c8pt1

AR/VR developers, particularly iOS; http://grnh.se/ybmlca1

Full-stack engineers (working on our distribution platform); http://grnh.se/qrpgjn1
